pipeline.row_types.segment_properties package

Submodules

pipeline.row_types.segment_properties.Theta module

class Theta(id: int, segment: Segment)

Bases: SegmentProperty

calculate_value(segment: Segment)

Returns the value for the segment property. This class needs to be overridden by any subclass that implements a segment property.

Parameters

segment (:class Segment) – The segment associated with the segment property
